languages.text: "Соломон, ты уверен, что это светская беседа, а не допрос?"
"Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"
languages.original_text: "Соломон, ты уверен, что это светская беседа, а не допрос?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"

languages.text: “索罗蒙，你确定这只是在闲聊，不是在审问吗？”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙，你确定这只是在闲聊，不是在审问吗？”

languages.text: «Solomorne, ¿tiene claro que esto es una conversación informal y no un interrogatorio?».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne, ¿tiene claro que esto es una conversación informal y no un interrogatorio?».

languages.text: "Solomorne, şu anda biz ayaküstü sohbet mi ediyoruz? Adamı sorguya çekiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, şu anda biz ayaküstü sohbet mi ediyoruz? Adamı sorguya çekiyoruz."

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、これは世間話であって、尋問じゃないことは分かってるか？」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、これは世間話であって、尋問じゃないことは分かってるか？」

languages.text: « Solomorne, pourquoi ai-je l'impression que cette conversation se transforme peu à peu en interrogatoire ? »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne, pourquoi ai-je l'impression que cette conversation se transforme peu à peu en interrogatoire ? »

languages.text: "Solomorne, ist das auch wirklich eine zwanglose Plauderei und kein Verhör?"
languages.original_text: "Solomorne, are you sure this is small talk and not an interrogation?"

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne, ist das auch wirklich eine zwanglose Plauderei und kein Verhör?"
